p: Finally, for C. ladanifer, the lowest yield values were obtained (0.036 and 0.037%). If these values are compared with the literature consulted ( Table 3), it can be observed that they are lower than those obtained on a laboratory scale, between 0.10 and 0.63 (% w/ w d.b.) but similar to the values corresponding to pilot-scale process, between 0.01 and 0.04 (% v/ w d.b.) [ 39].
